text: A deep state is a political situation in a country when an internal organ does not respond to the political leadership. Deep state may also refer to: * The Deep State: The Fall of the Constitution and the Rise of a Shadow Government, a book by Mike Lofgren on American politics * Deep State (TV series), a British espionage thriller television series ==See also== * Shadow government (disambiguation) * Deep state in Turkey, the alleged Turkish system * Deep state in the United States, the alleged American system
title: Deep state (disambiguation)
